Title: Requires physicians and hospitals to obtain the name of the school attended by school-aged patients and to include this information in their admission registration forms
Summary: Requires physicians and hospitals to obtain the name of the school attended by school-aged patients and to include this information in their admission registration forms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring physicians and hospitals to obtain the name of the school attended by school-aged patients and to include this information in their admission registration forms
